name: Corona Go!
description:
This game is based on Covid-19.

Key Features:

You can move around using the joystick

You gave the vaccine bullets to kill  Corona

You have to dodge the viruses and kill the viruses

If you touch the virus, You have been infected.

You can earn points by killing the viruses.

And can make a high score.

So Players,  kill the viruses and beat your score.
